programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E20, Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Taken in Tacoma
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E06, When 13-year-old Jennifer Bastian is abducted and murdered in August of 1986, residents of Tacoma panic. This is the second young girl killed in five months. Convinced a predator is loose, Police embark on a 32-year inquiry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E02, This is the story of the hunt for one of the most notorious serial killers in American history--the BTK killer. After committing at least seven brutal murders he vanished for over 25 years before sending clues of his crimes to the media in 2004.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E25, A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: Secret Agent Super Dragon
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Secret Agent Super Dragon, S05E04, A secret agent tries to stop a drug lord from taking over the world with hallucinogenic chewing gum.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.

programme.title: Swamp Diamonds

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

programme.title: The Black Scorpion
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Black Scorpion, S02E13, Giant scorpions rise out of a volcano and attack Mexico in The Black Scorpion (1957) while the Bots throw a party for Joel.

programme.title: The Brute Man
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Brute Man, S07E02, Rondo Hatton plays a disfigured man, a/k/a “The Creeper,” who hunts down and kills the people responsible for his deformity.

programme.title: The Castle of FuManchu
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Castle of FuManchu, S03E23, The Castle of FuManchu tries to conquer the world by turning all water into ice.

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Corpse Vanishes, S01E05, In the theater, Joel and the Bots get the third installment of "Radar Men from the Moon" before the Bela Lugosi film "The Corpse Vanishes".

programme.title: The Crawling Eye
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Crawling Eye, S01E01, Things start to look eerily familiar to scientists Crevett and Brooks when mountain climbers begin losing their heads in the Trollenberg Mountains.

programme.title: The Human Duplicators
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Human Duplicators, S05E20, An alien takes over a professor's mansion-basement laboratory, and makes android clones to infiltrate the government.

programme.title: Affinity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E07, Teal'c, having finally been cleared to live off-base, settles into his new neighborhood. His neighbors love him. He's quiet and he has become a sort of protector of his community but not everybody is as pleased about Teal'c's civilian assimilation.

programme.title: Covenant
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E08, Alec Colson is claiming he has shocking proof that the government is covering up a liaison with aliens, and that Earth was almost destroyed by an alien invasion, Colson gives all nations involved 24 hours to come clean or he'll do it for them.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E11, An old IDC comes through; Send M.A.L.P. The M.A.L.P. telemetry shows that the person sending the transmission is Carter but Carter is in the control room at SGC. The Carter on the other side explains that she is a Replicator.

programme.title: Prometheus Unbound
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E12, A mission has been greenlit to take the Prometheus to the Pegasus galaxy. Jackson wants in. O'Neill feels he is too valuable to risk. The decision is overridden by the mission commander, none other than Gen. Hammond, now head of home world security.

programme.title: It's Good To Be King
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E13, Hoping to warn Harry Maybourne of Goa'uld attacks, SG-1 arrives at his last known whereabouts to find that he has been appointed king of a primitive people and believes he possesses writings by a time-traveling Ancient predicting these events.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E14, When O'Neill finds the door to his home forced open and former Vice President Kinsey waiting for him inside, his first instinct is to call the police. But he allies himself with Kinsey when he learns of a rogue organization known as The Trust.

programme.title: Citizen Joe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E15, At a tag sale, civilian Joe Spencer comes across a small stone that gives him visions of SG-1 in action. Delighted, he shares the stories with anyone who will listen. But when he learns that SG-1 really exists, his excitement turns into obsession.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E16, Teal'c and Bra'tac believe the time is right to lead their people in an uprising against the Goa'uld. Their plan suffers a setback when an army of Replicators begins to systematically take control of Goa'uld ships and Jackson is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E17, Hidden in the ruined temple on Dakara is an Ancient weapon powerful enough to destroy the Replicators. Thanks to a timely warning, the team knows it. And thanks to Daniel's repressed Ancient knowledge, Replicator Carter knows it as well.

programme.title: The Defiant One
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E12, Sheppard and McKay set out, along with two scientists, to explore when they stumble upon a distress beacon coming from a Wraith ship. When they move to investigate, they discover that the ship has been sending out it's SOS signal for 10,000 years.

programme.title: Hot Zone
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E13, A team of scientists are surveying the city for damage after the storm when they unknowingly release a virus causing hallucinations and death. The virus infects McKay, Zelenka, and Ford leaving Sheppard to stop it from spreading further.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E14, While searching a new planet, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find a paradise world, Proculus, that would make an ideal sanctuary for those fleeing from the Wraith. The local inhabitants, however, believe their goddess will not permit it.

programme.title: Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E15, During an exploration of the city, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team find an old woman in suspended animation. Thinking her to be an Ancient, the team wakes her up, only to discover that it is Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson).

programme.title: The Brotherhood
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E16, The team searches for a valuable Zero Point Module rumored to be hidden on the planet Dagan, where the Sudarians were trusted with the module over 10,000 years ago. In their search the team begin to worry about their new allies, and their motives

programme.title: Letters From Pegasus
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E17, McKay discovers a way for the team to send messages to Earth, allowing the team to send messages to their loved ones as the Wraith approach the city. Sheppard and Teyla leave Atlantis in the hopes of gathering information about the Wraith army.

programme.title: The Things We Do For Love
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E08, Steve overhears Val discussing her pregnancy on the phone. David's grandfather leaves him $250,000 and a 1961 Thunderbird. An uncomfortable Tracy decides to quit her TV job after Brandon nixes a relationship.

programme.title: Loser Take All
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E09, Brandon goes to see Kenny, who portrays himself as an innocent victim caught on the web of an evil vixen. Mel, worried by David's newfound wealth, asks Donna to keep an eye on him. Steve impresses Clare with his dedication as he trains for the crew race.

programme.title: If I Had A Hammer
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E11, During must see a psychiatrist after displaying hostile behavior. Mel agrees with the doctor's recommendation that David be held 72 hours for observation. Steve faces plagiarism charges. The gang helps Willie build a house.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E12, Steve elects to plead guilty, leaving his punishment to the lenient Chancellor Arnold. Brandon refuses to plead guilty to a crime he did not commit, and faces a hearing and possible expulsion. Felice objects to Donna's renewed relationship with David.

programme.title: Unnecessary Roughness
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E15, Donna believes she has solved the mystery of her stalker's identity when she sees Garrett Slan, the man who tried to rape her, at the university.

programme.title: Face-Off
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E16, Donna's request for a permanent restraining order against Slan is denied. Tracy accidentally tells Brandon that she loves him. Steve and Clare consider living together as they spend a weekend house sitting. David takes an interest in a young singer.

programme.title: We Interrupt This Program
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E17, Donna's stalker confesses and holds the entire staff of the TV station hostage.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

My Christmas Grandpa, 20251122225200 +0000, A grouchy cashier is transformed by a child's love and compassion when she asks him to be her grandpa for Christmas.
